title: 174: Previewing the draft with Charles Davis, James Conner interview
itunes:title: 174: Previewing the draft with Charles Davis, James Conner interview
description:
NFL Media’s Charles Davis joins Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks to discuss the 2017 NFL Draft and the top quarterback prospects available. Pittsburgh running back James Conner also joins the show to talk about how he’s preparing for the NFL Draft and his biggest highlight, hardship and hero in his life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
